oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A ceremony performed with the Brachycerus (African Ground Weevil) in order to preserve young babies from convulsions. In the Katkop dialect by Dia!kwain (L V.-23. 5833-5840). The Brachycerus used to cure illness in little children. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-21. 7822-7825).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Custom observed with Bushman children, when too young to walk
